A D F J L N P R S T

A

available() - Method in class pogg.TheoraMovie
Checks if there is an available frame to be read.

D

dispose() - Method in class pogg.TheoraMovie
Call this to halt the movie from running, and stop its thread.
duration() - Method in class pogg.TheoraMovie
THIS METHOD IS HERE JUST FOR COMPATIBILITY WITH processing.video.Movie BUT IT DOES NOTHING Get the full length of this movie (in seconds).

F

fps - Variable in class pogg.TheoraMovie
The frames per second this movie was recorded at.

J

jump(float) - Method in class pogg.TheoraMovie
THIS METHOD IS HERE JUST FOR COMPATIBILITY WITH processing.video.Movie BUT IT DOES NOTHING Jump to a specific location (in seconds).

L

loop() - Method in class pogg.TheoraMovie
Begin playing the movie, with repeat.

N

noLoop() - Method in class pogg.TheoraMovie
Shut off the repeating loop.

P

pause() - Method in class pogg.TheoraMovie
THIS METHOD IS HERE JUST FOR COMPATIBILITY WITH processing.video.Movie BUT IT DOES NOTHING Pause the movie at its current time.
play() - Method in class pogg.TheoraMovie
THIS METHOD IS HERE JUST FOR COMPATIBILITY WITH processing.video.Movie BUT IT DOES NOTHING Begin playing the movie, with no repeat.
pogg - package pogg
 
printLogs(boolean) - Static method in class pogg.TheoraMovie
Enables or disables the debugging information

R

read() - Method in class pogg.TheoraMovie
Allows a new frame to be read

S

speed(float) - Method in class pogg.TheoraMovie
THIS METHOD IS HERE JUST FOR COMPATIBILITY WITH processing.video.Movie BUT IT DOES NOTHING Set a multiplier for how fast/slow the movie should be run.
stop() - Method in class pogg.TheoraMovie
Stop the movie, and rewind.

T

TheoraMovie - Class in pogg
This class implements the methods in processing.video.Movie but for Theora ogg files (using Cortado) instead of mov files.
TheoraMovie(String) - Constructor for class pogg.TheoraMovie
 
TheoraMovie(PApplet, String) - Constructor for class pogg.TheoraMovie
 
time() - Method in class pogg.TheoraMovie
Return the current time in seconds.
